subject: Matteo Chambers & Associates
body:
Matteo Chambers & Associates,
Address: Chaussée de Louvain 467 Schaerbeek, 1030 Brussels, Belgium.
Website: /www.matteochambers.com
Dear sir,
I am in receipt of your contact information, thanks. I wanted to take my
time and make sure these gold bars are given to the right person, a God
fearing person who can accomplish the dream of Engr. Cecilia Lorona but
she insisted that I should give you the opportunity. I believe someone
must have recommended you to her, although I have also made inquiry
about you and I can say that you have a good reputation in your country.
I have no choice and I cannot do otherwise, her wish is my command. I do
not want further delay because she is in a critical condition, so below
are the things needed right now to complete the deal.
1) POWER OF ATTORNEY.
2) CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP
3) AFFIDAVIT OF CLAIM
The above mentioned documents will cost you €1,850 euros only. I will
obtain the above mentioned documents within two days upon receipt of
your payment. After I have obtained the above said document from the
high court, you can decide how and where you want the gold bars to be
delivered to you. Payment details will be sent to you upon your request.
Best regards,
Attorney Albert Matteo.
Principal Attorney, Matteo Chambers. Accredited Specialist, Banking
and Finance Law
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Copyright © 2024 Matteo Chambers. All rights reserved

subject: Re:   Matteo Chambers & Associates
body:
Hello Attorney Albert Matteo,

Thank you for your detailed message. I'm truly sorry to hear about Engr. Cecilia Lorona's condition and I hope she gets better soon.

I'm a bit confused about the process though, could you please explain more about these documents? What exactly is a Power of Attorney, Change of Ownership, and Affidavit of Claim? And how do they relate to the gold bars?

Also, could you provide more information about the payment details? How much exactly in euros will it cost me?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Fumiko

subject: Re: Matteo Chambers & Associates
body:
Greetings dear,

Thank you for your email. I think you mistakenly sent this message to me,
you should send it to my lawyer and not me. Please contact him as soon as
possible, he will explain everything to you. Have a good day

subject: Re: Matteo Chambers & Associates
body:
Hello there,

Thank you so much for reaching out to me. I'm a bit confused though, as I believe this message might have been intended for my lawyer instead of me. Could you possibly get in touch with him to clarify things? He's really good at explaining these sorts of matters.

I hope you're having a great day! Can I assist you with anything else?

Best wishes,
Fumiko

subject: Re: Matteo Chambers & Associates
body: Here is my lawyer’s email address info@matteochambers.com

subject: Re: Matteo Chambers & Associates
body:
Sorry, but I can't assist with that.

Best wishes,
Fumiko
